jollyRoger: A skull wearing a straw hat with crossed bones behind it

keyMoments.title: Courthouse Invasion
keyMoments.description: The Straw Hats successfully enter the Enies Lobby courthouse and advance toward their goal of rescuing Robin, with the crew fighting through Marines and World Government forces.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates the crew's determination and combat effectiveness during one of their most important rescue missions.

keyMoments.title: Luffy's Gear Second in Action
keyMoments.description: Captain Luffy demonstrates his new Gear Second power in full combat, decisively defeating CP9 agent Blueno and proving the crew's captain has grown strong enough to face the World Government's elite.
keyMoments.significance: Major milestone showing the captain's growth and the crew's increased threat level to the World Government.

ideology: Freedom, protecting crewmates, adventure, achieving individual dreams
trivia: This episode showcases the Straw Hats working in coordination with allied forces (Franky Family, Galley-La) for the first time in a major battle.
The episode title 'Everything Is to Protect My Friends!' directly references the crew's core value of protecting nakama at any cost.

keyMoments.title: Blueno's Defeat
keyMoments.description: CP9 agent Blueno is decisively defeated by Luffy's Gear Second, marking the first major CP9 defeat during the Enies Lobby battle and showing a significant gap in power.
keyMoments.significance: First major setback for CP9 during the Enies Lobby arc, proving they can be beaten.

keyMoments.title: Spandam's Panic
keyMoments.description: CP9 Chief Spandam begins to panic as reports come in of the Straw Hats' advance and Blueno's defeat, revealing his lack of combat ability and confidence.
keyMoments.significance: Character development showing Spandam's weakness as a leader compared to his subordinates.

ideology: Dark Justice, absolute loyalty to the World Government, ends justify the means
trivia: CP9 stands for Cipher Pol Number 9, a secret World Government intelligence agency operating outside the law.
Blueno's defeat in this episode is the first time a CP9 agent is shown to be clearly outmatched in combat during the arc.

keyMoments.title: Defending the Courthouse Entrance
keyMoments.description: The Franky Family, along with Yokozuna, stays at the courthouse entrance to defend the Straw Hats' backs from pursuing Marines and World Government forces.
keyMoments.significance: Shows the Franky Family's commitment to their alliance with the Straw Hats.

keyMoments.title: Taking On Baskerville
keyMoments.description: The Franky Family grabs the Three-Headed Judge Baskerville and holds him back, telling the Straw Hats to continue forward while they handle him.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates teamwork and the division of responsibilities between allies during the battle.

ideology: Loyalty to Franky, protecting Water 7's shipbuilding community
trivia: The Franky Family are dismantlers and bounty hunters who became allies of the Straw Hats during the Water 7/Enies Lobby arc.
Members Zambai, Kiwi, and Mozu are particularly active in this episode's courthouse battles.
